thing.title: Icosahedron Experiment
thing.author: syvwlch
thing.description: Started playing around with TopMod, the open source topological mesh modeler, after seeing a piece of art fabbed from a file it generated, in a blog post about fabbing and art.Figured I'd start with something relatively simple and see how it rendered on Thingiverse.Download it here:topmod3d.org/Post here:gadgets.boingboing.net/2009/04/07/3d-printer-art-draft.html
